title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 431.13 - Summer camps to be used by commissioners of social services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 431.13 - Summer camps to be used by commissioners of social services

State Regulations

When commissioners of social services make provision for
the care of children and minors who are public charges pursuant to the
provision of section
398
of the

Social Services Law, they must make such provision in summer camps operated
only by nonprofit organizations, corporations or agencies having permits issued
by the appropriate public health officials in whose jurisdictions such camps
are located. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
431.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
